description:
Cinexis Remote Access: securely expose Home Assistant UI using Cinexis Cloud (FRP)

Licensing:
- license_key: required (e.g. CINX-DEMO-0001)
- frps_addr/frps_port: optional (defaults to VPS IP + 7000)
- ha_subdomain_suffix: optional (default .ha.cinexis.cloud)
name: Cinexis Remote FRPC
